detail_desc: Soft lace blouse with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Jersey lining.

Dungaree shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back and adjustable straps with a button. Kangaroo pocket with a print motif and sewn-on ears, concealed press-studs at the crotch, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and frayed, raw-edge hem.
Short dress in cotton denim with wide shoulder straps, buttons down the front, large patch front pockets and a detachable belt with a covered buckle at the waist. Unlined.
Long 5-pocket shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist and slightly lower crotch.
Shorts in organic cotton slub jersey in various designs with an elasticated waist.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Long, skeleton-shaped metal earrings. Length 10 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.

Wide blouse in softly draping satin with a sheen. Wide neckline with gathers for added width and a soft draping effect, and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Longer, fitted top in stretch cotton jersey with adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a soft, denim-look cotton blend. Wrapover hood, ribbed kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar and button placket.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.

Soft, non-wired bra in ribbed microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and dropped shoulders.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front.
Trenchcoat in a lightweight weave with notch lapels, shoulder tabs with decorative buttons, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.

Lounge set in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with an unlined drawstring hood, slits in the sides, raw edges and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, tapered legs with roll-edge hems.
Short, sleeveless dress in woven fabric with smocking at the back, a concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is partly recycled.
Strapless dress in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Narrow, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps.

Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a seam and gathered flounce at the hem.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Suede laptop case with a zip at the top and cotton lining. Fits 13" laptops.
Flared skirt in a sturdy, fine-knit cotton blend with an embroidered pattern, and concealed elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Chinos in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket.

Playsuit in a linen weave with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the top. Short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and an extra layer of fabric at each side with a tie detail at the front.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Trainers in shimmering metallic imitation leather with an appliquéd hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, two buttons at the top, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and short slits in the sides.
Warm-lined trainers in imitation leather with a tulle flower decoration and a hook and loop fastening at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey with a contrasting colour trim around the neckline and sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with pleats and pin-tucks at the front and a button at the neckline. Short puff sleeves and a narrow tie belt at the waist.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
Lace trousers with covered elastication at the waist and wide legs with scalloped hems. Jersey lining.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Jacket in soft fleece made partly from recycled polyester designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Narrow elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dress in a patterned viscose weave with buttons at the top and a lace yoke at the front. Gathered seam at the top and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Sleeveless, straight-cut top in airy cotton poplin with a collar, concealed zip at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in airy, patterned chiffon with a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif, sightly wider neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt pockets with a decorative button at the back. Legs with creases.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Cold shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with a small frill trim, drawstring at the top and button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in a patterned viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked bodice with a frill trim at the top, a seam at the waist and long, wide legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum comfort.

V-neck blouse in an airy weave with a slight sheen and velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, long sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in cotton canvas with imitation leather details, a padded top edge and elasticated lacing at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lined jacket in felted fabric with a pile collar with a press-stud closure, zip down the front, flap front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey with a hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. High waist with pleats, and wide legs that taper to the hem.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline at the front and frill-trimmed smocking at the back. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the shoulders and cuffs, a seam under the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Soft, non-wired, push-up bra with moulded, padded triangular cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace trim and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Sleeveless nursing top in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with a double layer at the top and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Scarf in soft, rib-knit cashmere. Size 30x180 cm.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy patterned weave with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side and a laser-cut hem. Unlined.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with slits and ties.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in soft cotton jersey with wide, visible elastic at the waist and a lined gusset.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen and a pile-lined hood with a faux-fur trim. Zip down the front, a zipped sleeve pocket, flap side pockets with a press-stud and an inner pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and a decorative appliqué on the knees.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and zip down the front. Welt side pockets, stretch ribbed panels at the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slim Fit.
Short-sleeved top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a decorative button band down the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leather slides with a braided foot strap, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Metal necklace with metal wire flowers and an adjustable fastener.
